alert.note: Alert for Kootenai (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 21 at 3:47PM MST until February 21 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Northwestern Kootenai County in the Panhandle of Idaho... * Until 345 PM PST. * At 245 PM PST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Spirit Lake to near Hayden Lake, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 2 and 16. U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 428 and 447. Locations impacted include... Coeur d'Alene, Post Falls, Hayden, Rathdrum, Dalton Gardens, Spirit Lake, Hauser, Hayden Lake, Otis Orchards-East Farms, Fernan Lake Village, Huetter, State Line and Chilco. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
